name: The Last Turkey - Thanksgiving Hybrid
description:
The last turkey, the one who survived the thankful massacre is here, and he really doesn't want another one of these events to happen and he's got the squirrels. In this two player game, where you will be playing as a Red Panda and a Polar Bear, will stop them before it's too late (even though it's almost December). 

Controls and Stats:

(Press "Enter" to get past the first room)

PLAYERS:

Red Panda: WASD and mouse to aim, with the left mouse button to shoot. and 5 HP

Polar Bear: Arrow keys, and 20 HP (use this HP to shield the Red Panda from snowballs).

ENEMIES:

Squirrels: 1 HP, and AI distance-based fired snowballs.

General Emperor Smith: 50 HP, and AI distance-based fast-firing snowballs.
